div.h3: St. Bernard Parish’s Response to the Coronavirus Update 3/19/20 10:00 a.m. Chalmette, LA. – St. Ber

div.p: LA Department of Health tracks where a person lives and that’s how the numbers are counted. St. Bernard will release the information during morning and afternoon video updates by the Parish President and other local officials. As of today, St. Bernard has a total of four (4) parish residents that have tested positive for the Coronavirus. You can also track the number of cases in St. Bernard Parish by visiting www.ldh.la.gov/coronavirus.

p.strong: Help reduce the spread of the Coronavirus by

ul.li: Stay out of public parks and playgrounds
Refrain from gatherings of 10 or more people
Stay home if you are sick

p.strong: Stay Up-to-date on St. Bernard Parish’s response to COVID-19

ul.li: View St. Bernard Parish Television YouTube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/stbernardparishtelevision

p.strong: State and federal information on COVID-19

ul.li: Visit LA Department of Health www.ldh.la.gov/coronavirus
Visit Centers for Disease Control www.cdc.gov
